message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $150 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $120 for it. Can you consider my offer?

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer! I understand that $150 might be a bit high for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $135. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $135 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

Hi Bob, I understand that $125 is still a bit of a stretch for you. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $130. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product brings. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but $130 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $125 again, but this is my final offer. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll take the product.

Hi Bob, I understand that $125 is your final offer, but I'm not willing to sell the product at that price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $128. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product brings. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll accept your offer.

I'm sorry, but $128 is still a bit too high for me. I've already gone as low as I can, and I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet in the middle. I'll give you one more chance to meet me at $125, and that's my final offer.

Hi Bob, I understand that you've gone as low as you can, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product at $125. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $129. This is my final offer, and if you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll accept your offer.

I'm sorry, but $129 is still out of my budget. I've reached my limit, and I'm not willing to go any higher. I think we've gone back and forth enough, and I'm going to have to pass on this deal. I'll consider buying the product from John for $100 instead.
